Package org.apache.sling.api.uri

Interface SlingUri

All Superinterfaces:
RequestPathInfo
@ProviderType public interface SlingUri extends RequestPathInfo

Represents an immutable URI in the same way as java.net.URI but is extended with Sling-specific URI parts (e.g. selectors). A SlingUri usually points to a resource but alternatively, can also contain an opaque URI like mailto: or javascript:. Use adjust(Consumer) or SlingUriBuilder to create new or modified Sling URIs.

Opposed to URI, the regular getters of SlingUri will not return decoded values, rather the values for user info, path, query and fragment are returned exactly as set before.

Since:
1.0.0 (Sling API Bundle 2.23.0)

    • adjust

      @NotNull default @NotNull SlingUri adjust(@NotNull @NotNull Consumer<SlingUriBuilder> builderConsumer)
      Shortcut to adjust Sling URIs, e.g. slingUri = slingUri.adjust(b -> b.setExtension("html")); .
